title: Westgate Mall
description: Westgate, Nairobi’s premier shopping mall is East Africa’s finest shopping, leisure and pleasure destination. Lots of daily, weekly and monthly entertainment for the whole family; Westgate is the only shopping mall in East Africa that has shoppers engaged in exciting and enlightening events for all. With over 80 stores and a variety of art and craft kiosks in our pop-up market as well as entertainment outlets and restaurants; Westgate upholds the standards to keep our shoppers happy and give them the best variety. Westgate Shopping Mall is easily accessible from the city environs. Shoppers are assured of an enjoyable and convenient shopping experience in a relaxed atmosphere; all under one roof. Westgate has ample parking for over 700 cars
